pageContent: Purpose: National attention has focused on whether urology-radiation oncology practice integration, known as integrated prostate cancer centers, contributes to the use of intensity modulated radiation therapy, a common and expensive prostate cancer treatment.

metaData.source:
Multilevel Factors Associated With Overall Mortality for Men Diagnosed With Prostate Cancer in Florida
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/24297455/
